revision.text:
{{stub}} '''XMI''', or '''XMIDI''' is a variant (and incompatible) [[MIDI]] format developed by John Miles for the Audio Interface Library, a middleware library for audio playback. AIL v2 was open-sourced; AIL v3 became the {{wp|Miles_Sound_System|Miles Sound System}} and was bought by {{wp|RAD_Game_Tools|RAD Game Tools}} in 1995.
==External links== * [http://www.thegleam.com/ke5fx/ The Gleam] — John Miles' personal website, on which the complete source for the AIL v2 can be found. * [http://www.radgametools.com/miles.htm RAD Game Tools] — official website for the MSS. * {{vgmpfw}} [[Category:Audio formats]]
